code: import axios from"axios";var SERVER='http://127.0.0.1:8000';var headers={'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':'JWT fefege..'};var remove=function remove(x){return axios.delete("".concat(SERVER,"/task/remove/").concat(x));};var create=function create(x){return axios.post("".concat(SERVER,"/task/create"),JSON.stringify(x),{headers:headers});};var modify=function modify(x){return axios.put("".concat(SERVER,"/task/modify/").concat(x));};export default{remove:remove,create:create,modify:modify};
